titles.title: Low-Income Housing Credit bill
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend certain tax provisions relating to the Low-Income Housing Credit and Qualified Mortgage Bonds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permanently extend the low-income housing credit. Provides for the permanent extension of the period during which qualified mortgage bonds and mortgage credit certificates may be issued.
